name: Add Blitz
description:
Add Blitz is a fun game you haven't experience before. Hype up your addition skills to the next level!

To play this game, just tap the numbers to select. You earn points when the last selected number is the sum of pre-selected numbers . e.g. tap 5, tap 5, tap 10

Pointing system gets higher and higher but also gets tricker as you progress.

Beat your own score! Brag to your family and friends! Have fun!

#AddBlitzChallenge

Available on Google Play
